Input: When the screen of the phone is locked, the video should keep playing.
I want to be able listen to music even when my phone is in my pocket.
The video should not start loading while ads are playing
It bothers me that ads load while the rest of the video still has to load
A category for educational videos should be added as well
Currently, it is hard to find educational videos.
Show the likes and dislikes already before you have clicked on a video
This would give users an idea of the quality of the video
It would be nice is a option is given to alter the font size
